title: Ye Watchers and Ye Holy Ones

lyrics.text:
Ye watchers and ye holy ones, bright seraphs, cherubim, and thrones, raise the glad strain, Alleluia!
Cry out, dominions, princedoms, powers, virtues, archangels, angels' choirs:

O higher than the cherubim, more glorious than the seraphim, lead their praises, Alleluia!
Thou bearer of th' eternal Word, most gracious, magnify the Lord:

Respond, ye souls in endless rest, ye patriarchs and prophets blest, Alleluia! Alleluia!
Ye holy twelve, ye martyrs strong, all saints triumphant, raise the song:

O friends, in gladness let us sing, supernal anthems echoing, Alleluia! Alleluia!
To God the Father, God the Son, and God the Spirit, Three in One:

author: John Athelstan Laurie Riley (1906)
